DOC.brief_summary: This study assesses the long-term safety and efficacy of adalimumab in pediatric subjects with ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety and Efficacy Study of Adalimumab in Pediatric Subjects With Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: Subject must have successfully enrolled and completed M11290 study Subject considered by the investigator, for any reason, to be an unsuitable candidate
